name: Sugar Lump
description:
You Sugar Lump. Everywhere dirty.

WASD + SPACE to smash face.

Total of 4 levels.

Not as fleshed out as I would have liked, but I'm sure I'm not the only one with this wish.

Thanks for playing! Don't be a stranger! Leave a comment and check out the links below!

Awesome music by: Hart find him: https://soundcloud.com/user-682766289

and here: https://www.youtube.com/user/HartkorcraftPOWRACA/videos

https://hartkorcraft.bandcamp.com/

Game made with Godot and Asesprite and here is my twitter if you wish to stay connected, come say hi: https://twitter.com/spoonsweet1

and Youtube as well! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgiKD2hd3MCmVvxjHNnPe-g
